a.detail: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor
a.summary: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor

c.detail:
Symbol of Hypnosis: DC 10 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become incapacitated for 1d4 rounds

e.detail:
Earthmaw Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 piercing damage

m.detail:
Rune of Paralyzation: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 10 save or become paralyzed for 1d4 rounds

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a tomb. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been conquered and altered many times since then.

monster: Treasure: 2200 cp, 900 sp, 80 gp, 4 x diamond (50 gp), jasper (50 gp), zircon (50 gp), +1 Shield (uncommon, dmg 200), Cloak of Elvenkind (uncommon, dmg 158), Stone of Good Luck (uncommon, dmg 205)
detail.room_features: A ladder ascends to a wooden platform in the north-west corner of the room, and a mural of legendary monsters covers the ceiling

north.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
west.secret: The door is concealed behind an area of slime

south.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

north.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp) (slides up)

monster: Treasure: 1800 cp, 1400 sp, 50 gp, diamond (50 gp), chrysoprase (50 gp), jasper (50 gp), 2 x Potion of Water Breathing (uncommon, dmg 188)
detail.room_features: Several square holes are cut into the south and west walls, and several pieces of rotten rope are scattered throughout the room

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed behind an area of slime

south.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 20 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp) (slides to one side)
west.trap:
Rune of Dread: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 19 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

west.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

2400 cp, 1300 sp, 100 gp, a fine leather mantle trimmed with rabbit fur (25 gp), a fine steel chime inlaid with ornate electrum scrollwork (25 gp), a marble plate engraved with arcane runes (25 gp), a wooden puzzle box inlaid with a filigree of electrum (25 gp), Armor of Vulnerability (rare, dmg 152)
monster: Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272) and 1 x Warhorse Skeleton (cr 1/2, mm 273); hard, 150 xp

contents.summary: Skeleton and 1 x Warhorse Skeleton, Hidden Treasure

east.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

wandering_monsters.1: 3 x Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); hard, 150 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.2: Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); easy, 50 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.3: Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); easy, 50 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: 3 x Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); hard, 150 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.5: Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); easy, 50 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.6: 3 x Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); hard, 150 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
